text:
Created attachment 27647
Example XSL-FO file

If long word does not fit block or table cell or something like that, it is cropped and message about overflow is show. Maybe it is possible to add word wrapping option and enter a new value for attribute "wrap-option", for example "word-wrap". Example and patch for probable realization attached.
creator: alexey.hlyavich@duallab.com
gadams@apache.org
text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review

text: not a bug; behavior is according to spec
batch transition resolved+wontfix to closed+wontfix; if you believe this remains a bug and can demonstrate it with appropriate input FO file and output PDF file (as applicable), then you may reopen
